nouns: Basic emotion
Anger is an emotional response related to one's psychological interpretation of having been threatened.

The state of being angry.
Anger is a common emotional response to real or imagined threats or harm to oneself or others, characterized by a desire, whether internalized or expressed, to engage in aggressive retaliation.
A fist bump is a gesture similar in meaning to a handshake or high five.
A gesture similar in meaning to a handshake or high five
That part of the fore limb below the forearm or wrist in primates (including humans).
The part of the fore limb below the forearm or wrist in a human, and the corresponding part in many other animals.
The zoological term for the distal portion of the forelimb of an animal (including the human hand)
Part of the fore limb.
The (prehensile) extremity of the superior limb
The manus is the zoological term for the distal portion of the fore limb of an animal.
A hand, as the part of the fore limb below the forearm in a man, or the corresponding part in other vertebrates.

The raised fist is a symbol of solidarity and support.

The closed hand with the fingers on the palm.

description: This version of the  Oncoming Fist emoji has the  Medium-light Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Cream White Skin Tone on suppo
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the oncoming fist emoji in a medium-light skin tone is rendered with a strong sense of presence, featuring bold contours, realistic shading, and a tactile appearance. The smooth, rounded knuckles and the dynamic angle of approach convey power and solidarity, characteristic of Apple's 3D design. This emoji is commonly used on Apple devices to express support, agreement, a high-five, or a sense of solidarity and collective strength.
